data.eml:eml: A new species of Gadirtha Walker (Nolidae, Eligminae): a proposed biological control agent of Chinese tallow (Triadica sebifera (L.) Small) (Euphorbiaceae) in the United States

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pogue, Michael G. (2014): A new species of Gadirtha Walker (Nolidae, Eligminae): a proposed biological control agent of Chinese tallow (Triadica sebifera (L.) Small) (Euphorbiaceae) in the United States. ZooKeys 382: 13-25, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.382.6600, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.382.6600
